note.p: Birth: College Square East, Belfast (26 June 1824)
Death: Netherhall, near Largs, Ayrshire (17 December 1907)
Burial: Westminster Abbey
Research Field: Physics
Career: Fellow, St Peter's College, Cambridge; Professor of Natural Philosophy, University of Glasgow.
Honours: Kt 1866; Baron Kelvin 1892; GCVO 1896; OM 1902
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 5/06/1851
Medals/Prizes: Royal Medal 1856; Copley Medal 1883
Lectures: Bakerian 1856
Council: PRS 1890-1895
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1908 vol 81 pp iii-lxxvi, three plates, signed by J L
